data.title: Sandi Pasagic, 27, is a business owner and Chill alum from Burlington, VT. Watch the video above to hear from Sandi about what he is up to...
data.meta_description:
143 likes, 5 comments - chillfoundation on December 7, 2023: "Sandi Pasagic, 27, is a business owner and Chill alum from Burlington, VT. Watch the video above to hear from Sandi about what he is up to now, and how snowboarding has helped his mental health throughout his life beyond Chill.

Research has repeatedly proven that time outdoors reduces levels of stress, depression, and anxiety. In recent yearâ€™s surveys, 84% of Chill youth said they felt like they belonged at Chill, 86% said they were challenged to think and build new skills, and 91% said Chill helped them feel more confident about themselves.

With your support, Chill is proud to be working to break down the barriers to entry in the outdoor community.

Donate this holiday season at the link in our bio!

Every donation, up to $200K before December 31, 2023, will be matched by Chill partners @rally2give and @boafitsystem - so your gift will have double the impact!

#ChillFoundation #Diversifyoutdoors".
